p: Likewise, the FTIR spectrum from A. nilgiricum methanolic rhizome extract showed the presence of functional groups with peaks at 3421.17 cm −1 (alcohols, phenols), 2926.01 cm −1 (alkanes), 1634.07 cm −1 (amines), 1553.35 cm −1 (nitro compounds), 1409.21 cm −1 (aromatics), 1089.19 cm −1 (aliphatic amines), 893.20 cm −1 (aromatics), 537.82 cm −1 (alkyl halides) (Fig. 1c).
